title: Can't post on other boards?
body: It says I can't post on other boards because I need to be level 7, but if you click my profile, I'm already level 30 and in ranked. What do?

replies.body: Sometimes your profile needs to sync up to the boards.  If this is still an issue, there is a [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) that can fix this right up!
